channel.title: Blog of Sfpd team @Eurostar Testing Conference on
channel.description: Recent content in Blog of Sfpd team @Eurostar Testing Conference on

item.description: Setup For Using the Blog Accessing the blog Blog of Sfpd team @Eurostar Testing Conference (renahud.github.io) Installation Create/ give me your github account OR a public ssh key you want to commit with.

item.title: # Service Fédéral des Pensions / Federale Pensioen Dienst
item.description: SFPD is the belgian federal pension service.

item.title: Manon
item.description: “Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.” – Oscar Wilde

item.title: Renaud
item.description: Hi, I’m a 34 years old java developer. I’ve been working at SFPD for 13 years. This is my first time attending at the Eurostar Testing conference and I’m eager to learn more about the testing mindset.

item.title: Tuesday 07-06-2022
item.description: Attended Tutorials From Business Workflows to Automated Tests Simplicity: Distilling and Refining Test Communication Shaping Testing – A Simulation in Scrum

item.title: Tutorial I
item.description: Notes by Renaud, Manon Simplicity: Distilling and Refining Test Communication Renaud & Manon: blablabla

item.title: Tutorial A
item.description: Notes by Virginie Official introduction Shaping Testing – A Simulation in Scrum get experience with splitting stories and epics together with the team get experience with raising risks (probabiblity x impact) with the team perform estimates with the team as a whole collaborating on the test approach within the team: defining tests levels together with the whole team = raise the discussion as a team to get a common understanding of quality

item.title: Tutorial F - From Business Workflows to Automated Tests
item.description: Notes by Renaud Tutorail By Dr Anne Kramer, using Yest (Yest has a jira integration) Introduction Visualising Busines Workflows Also known as Model Based testing.

item.title: Virginie
item.description: Hi, I am test lead and scrum master at Dagobah team. It’s been two years within Covid period that I had the chance to follow the Eurostar Testing Conference online.
